title: UbongoKids
description: Ubongo is a Tanzanian social enterprise that creates fun, localized edutainment for learners in Africa. "Ubongo" means brain in Kiswahili, and we're all about finding fun ways to stimulate kids (and kids at heart) to use their brains. Our entertaining media help learners understand concepts, rather than memorizing them. And we use catchy songs and captivating imagery to make sure they never forget

children.title: Uploads from Ubongo Kids
Uploads from Ubongo Kids
Matendo ya Hisabati | Jifunze Hesabu na Ubongo Kids | Katuni za Elimu kwa Kiswahili
children.description:
Je unajua tofauti kati ya +, -, x, na kadhalika? Jifunze matendo ya hisabati kutumia huu wimbo ya kuelimisha kutoka katuni ya Ubongo Kids!

Jamani! Mwaka huu, Ubongo Kids ni ZAIDI ya hisabati na sayansi! Msimu huu si KAMA ULIVYOZOEA!

Ubongo Kids MPYA inamjenga mwanao, ikimpa fikra komavu zitakazomwezesha kutambua kusudi lake masomoni na maishani!

Njoo nasi Kokotoa, ukajifunze kutumia uwezo na utashi wako kusuluhisha changamoto zinazokukabili ili ufike pale utakapo!

Msimu wa 3 wa Ubongo Kids utakuandaa kifikra, ukichochea uwezo wako wa kung’amua matatizo na kuyatafutia ufumbuzi.

Ubongo Kids ni mfululizo wa hadithi za kusisimua zilizo katika mfumo wa elimu-burudani kwa ajili ya watoto wa miaka 7 hadi 13, zikitumia nyimbo na maudhui ya Kiafrika kuwafundisha hisabati na sayansi!

Katuni hii mahususi ya elimu inaandaliwa na Ubongo Learning, ambao pia ni watengenezaji wa kipindi murua ya AkiliandMe inayowaandaa watoto wa miaka 3-6 kwa ajili ya kwenda shule!

Tazama Ubongo Kids kila Jumamosi na Jumapili saa 3 asubuhi kupitia TBC1! Pata pia webisodes zetu zote kupitia: http://www.ubongokids.com

children.title: Ishi Maisha kwa Kusudi | Ubongo Kids Singalong | African Educational Cartoons
children.description:
Ni vizuri kuishi maisha kwa kusudi! Kuwa na malengo!

Jamani! Mwaka huu, Ubongo Kids ni ZAIDI ya hisabati na sayansi! Msimu huu si KAMA ULIVYOZOEA!

This video was made possible by a grant from the Goodall Foundation. http://www.goodall-foundation.org.uk/

Ubongo Kids MPYA inamjenga mwanao, ikimpa fikra komavu zitakazomwezesha kutambua kusudi lake masomoni na maishani!

Njoo nasi Kokotoa, ukajifunze kutumia uwezo na utashi wako kusuluhisha changamoto zinazokukabili ili ufike pale utakapo!

Msimu wa 3 wa Ubongo Kids utakuandaa kifikra, ukichochea uwezo wako wa kung’amua matatizo na kuyatafutia ufumbuzi.

Ubongo Kids ni mfululizo wa hadithi za kusisimua zilizo katika mfumo wa elimu-burudani kwa ajili ya watoto wa miaka 7 hadi 13, zikitumia nyimbo na maudhui ya Kiafrika kuwafundisha hisabati na sayansi!

Katuni hii mahususi ya elimu inaandaliwa na Ubongo Learning, ambao pia ni watengenezaji wa kipindi murua ya AkiliandMe inayowaandaa watoto wa miaka 3-6 kwa ajili ya kwenda shule!

Tazama Ubongo Kids kila Jumamosi na Jumapili saa 3 asubuhi kupitia TBC1! Pata pia webisodes zetu zote kupitia: http://www.ubongokids.com

children.title: Ubongo Learn Anywhere Kits | multiplatform, adaptable edutainment kits for education in emergencies
children.description:
Help us develop Learn Anywhere Kits with Ubongo's fun and effective edutainment. They need to be adaptable and easily deployable in a variety of different emergency environments, to provide informal learning while formal school is paused or being set up.

Find out more here: https://challenges.openideo.com/challenge/education-emergencies/refinement/ubongo-learning-club-in-a-box

www.ubongo.co

Ubongo Kids ni mfululizo wa hadithi za kusisimua zilizo katika mfumo wa elimu-burudani kwa ajili ya watoto wa miaka 7 hadi 13, zikitumia nyimbo na maudhui ya Kiafrika kuwafundisha hisabati na sayansi!

Katuni hii mahususi ya elimu inaandaliwa na Ubongo Learning, ambao pia ni watengenezaji wa kipindi murua ya AkiliandMe inayowaandaa watoto wa miaka 3-6 kwa ajili ya kwenda shule!

Tazam Ubongo Kids kila Jumamosi na Jumapili saa 3 asubuhi kupitia TBC1! Pata pia  webisodes zetu zote kupitia: http://www.ubongokids.com

children.title: East African Legislative Assembly + Ubongo Kids - Wimbo wa EALA! (Kiswahili)
children.description:
EALA ni Bunge la Afrika Mashariki! Imba na Mama Ndege na Anko T kuhusu Uafrika Mashariki!

LYRICS:
Kuna moto msituni angani ndege matatani.
Harufu ya moshi ni karaha kwa nyani.
Tembo wanahaha pa kukanyaga panawaka.
Chura wanalia kwa sauti wasikika.

Pamoja wamekutana. Aha! Shida kutatua?
Umoja wamejiunga suluhisho kulipata.
Kukubaliana bila kusita, sheria kuziweka.
Msitu usiwe balaa, nyumba yenye furaha.

EALA! EALA! EALA!
Pamoja tunaweza, sheria tukiweka!

EALA! EALA! EALA!
Tunasikilizana, tunashirikiana!

Nijibu nauliza, umeshasikia EALA?
Nakuambia dhumuni ni kulinda kwa sheria.
Twajivunia Bunge la Afrika Mashariki, sheria kuzitunga.
Miswaada na hoja kupitisha, lengo kuboresha jumuyia

45 wake kwa waume, kuchaguliwa na Afrika mashariki.
Wote  kuwasilisha, madhara tunayopata wewe na mimi
Bajeti kukubaliana, uhakika wa pesa kuzipata.
Hakuna shaka kwa pamoja tutajenga, wote ni wamoja.

Kuweka watu wote kama jamii moja.
Kutoka kwangu hadi kwako barabara kuzijenga.
Afrika mashariki kutasifika kwa ubora.
Shida yako, ni shida yangu kuzuia ni lazima.

EALA! EALA! EALA!
Pamoja tunaweza, Sheria tukiweka

EALA! EALA! EALA!
Tunasikilizana, Tunashirikiana!

--
www.eala.org
Twitter: http://twitter.com/ea_bunge
Instagram: http://instagram.com/eac_parliament
http://facebook.com/eastafricanlegislativeassembly

--

www.wfd.org

Karibuni Lala Land, ulimwengu wa maajabu, ambapo utajifunza na kucheza na Akili!  Imba namba! Cheza herufi! Cheka, chora, na jifunza Kiingereza na Akili.

children.title: Ubongo Kids Kickstarter Video
children.description:
Ubongo Kids is Tanzania's first homegrown cartoon series, designed to help kids discover the joys of math through fun, local stories and songs.

We're turning to Kickstarter to help us adapt our first 13-episode TV season from Kiswahili to English, for broadcast to millions more kids across Africa and web viewers around the world.

children.description:
We created this song especially for International Day of the Girl Child (October 11). Girls today may have access to resources and opportunities that their mothers, grandmothers, and great-grandmothers could only dream off. But there is still a lot of work to be done to ensure that all girls have the tools and support they need to have the future they deserve. While today we officially celebrate girls across the world, let’s continue working towards creating a world where every girl can not only survive but thrive!

children.title: East African Legislative Assembly + Ubongo Kids - The EALA Song!
children.description:
Sing about East African-ness with the Ubongo Kids!

The East African Legislative Assembly is an organ of the East African Community; established under Article 9 of the Treaty for the Establishment of the East African Community. The Assembly has a cardinal function in the furtherance of Community objectives; this function encompasses the legislative, representative and oversight mandate.

--

children.title: Uploads from Akili and Me - Kiswahili

Tuhesabu Maembe na Akili! | Nyimbo za Hesabu | Katuni za Elimu kwa Kiswahili
children.description:
Msaidie mwanao kujianda kuanza darasa la kwanza na kujifunza kuhesaba kwa kiswahili kupitia video kotoka katuni ya Akili and Me!

Karibuni Lala Land, ulimwengu wa maajabu, ambapo utajifunza na kucheza na Akili! Imba namba! Cheza herufi! Cheka, chora, na jifunze Kiingereza na Akili. Mtoto wako atafurahi sana kujifunza na Akili, Happy Hippo, Little Lion na Bush Baby!

Angalia "Akili and Me" TBC1 saa 3 asubuhi j1 & j2 pamoja na Ubongo Kids.

Ride the rainbow to Lala Land, and join Akili and her friends on a magical learning adventure. Sing with numbers, dance with letters, draw, play and learn Swahili with Akili!

African and Black children get to see themselves represented in the content they watch through these colorful, engaging and enriching cartoons that help every child find the fun in learning.

Help us create more great letter learning videos: www.ubongo.co/letters

As featured in Project Literacy Lab!

Watch “Akili and Me” on TBC1, 9am Saturday and Sunday mornings!

children.title: Rudi shule na Akili! Tumia app yake BURE kujifunza HERUFI kwa Kiswahili fasaha!
children.description:
App yetu ya “Herufi na Akili” itampatia mwanao msingi imara wa Elimu!

App hii ni tafsiri ya Kiswahili ya #Akili's Alphabet: Game #1 ya Elimu Tanzania yenye mashabiki wengi, liyopakuliwa zaidi ya mara 9,000 kwenye Play Store!

“Herufi na Akili” inamwandaa mtoto wako kwa ajili ya kwenda SHULE. App hii hutumia michezo na nyimbo kufundisha mwanao jinsi ya kutamka herufi na kumfunza maneno mapya!

Mtoto wako atafurahia ELIMU na app hii ya BURE inayoletwa kwako na waandaaji wa katuni murua ya elimu-burudani ya “Akili and Me.”!

Mwanao atajifunza na Happy Hippo, Bush Baby na Little Lion, akiimba na kusikiliza nyimbo za herufi azipendazo kutoka kwenye kipindi cha "Akili and Me."

KUHUSU “AKILI AND ME”
“Akili and Me” ni katuni murua ya elimu na burudani inayoandaliwa na Ubongo, watengenezaji wa “Ubongo Kids” na programu nyingine nyingi za kujifunza zilizoundwa mahususi kwa ajili ya watoto wa Afrika.

Karibu Lala Land, ulimwengu wa maajabu, ambapo utajifunza na kucheza na Akili! Imba namba! Cheza herufi! Cheka, chora, na jifunze Kiingereza na Kiswahili na Akili.

Njoo ufurahi na Little Lion, Happy Hippo na Bush Baby kila Jumamosi na Jumapili saa 3 asubuhi kupitia TBC1 (Tanzania), na Jumamosi pekee saa 3 asubuhi kupitia Citizen TV (Kenya).

KUHUSU UBONGO
Ubongo ni kampuni ya kijamii ya Tanzania inayoandaa vipindi na katuni mahususi za elimu na burudani kwa ajili ya watoto wa Afrika, ikitumia teknolojia za kidijitali kama redio, simu, televisheni na vitabu vya mtandaoni kuwafikia popote pale walipo.

Mkakati wetu ni kuwafurahisha wana wa Afrika, tukiwafunza ili wapende kujifunza zaidi kwa uwezo na nafasi yao, wakitumia teknolojia walizo nazo. Njoo utazame vipindi maarufu vya “Ubongo Kids” na “Akili and Me” vinavyofikia zaidi ya nyumba milioni 5.1 barani Afrika.

Hii ndiyo herufi Ch!

children.title: I am a GIRL! | GIRL POWER Song | International Day of the Girl Child
children.description:
We created this song especially for International Day of the Girl Child (October 11). Girls today may have access to resources and opportunities that their mothers, grandmothers, and great-grandmothers could only dream off. But there is still a lot of work to be done to ensure that all girls have the tools and support they need to have the future they deserve. While today we officially celebrate girls across the world, let’s continue working towards creating a world where every girl can not only survive but thrive!

children.title: Eradicate Illiteracy in Africa with Ubongo Learning
children.description:
Ubongo, is a grassroots social enterprise that creates fun localised edu-cartoons for kids across Africa and reaches them through the technologies they already use (TV, radio, and mobile phones). We need your help to help kids in Africa learn how to read and write, and ultimately break the cycle of poverty illiteracy creates.

DONATE NOW: www.ubongo.co/letters

children.title: A is for Akili - Alphabet Song - African Educational ABC's
children.description:
Learn the letters of the alphabet with Akili and her friends!

It's THE ALPHABET SONG from Akili and Me! Fun learning from Africa for preschoolers around the world!

A is for Akili, a-a-a-Akili!
B is for baby, b-b-b-Bush Baby!
C is for cat, c-c-c-c-cat!
D is for dance, dance like a dog!

A, B, C, D, the next one is E!

E is for elephant, look at all the elephants!
F is for family, f-f-f-f-family!
G is for goat, g-g-g-g-goat!
H is for house, Happy Hippo's house!

E, F, G, H, the alphabet is really great!

I is for insect, icky icky insect!
J is for jump! Jump! Jump! Jump!
K is for kite, k-k-k-k-kite.
L is for lion, laugh with Little Lion!

I, J, K, L, we use letters to spell!

M is for mountain, march up the mountain!
N is for night, nighty night night!
O is for ocean, swim in the ocean!
P is for please, always say please!
Q is for quiet, shh be very quiet!

M, N, O, P, Q, we'll sing the alphabet for you!

W is for wind, w-w-w-w-wind!
X is for box, at the end of boX!
Y is for yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes!
Z is for zebra, z-z-z-z-zebra!

W, X, Y, Z, that's all the letters A through Z!

Akili and Me is a new edutainment series from Ubongo Media, creators of Ubongo Kids. Kids 3-6 year olds will love joining Akili on her magical adventures in Lala Land, where they’ll learn numbers, letters, drawing and English.

children.description:
Let's ride the rainbow to Lala Land! Join Akili and her friends on a magical learning adventure. Watch “Akili and Me” on TBC1 Tanzania, 9am Saturday and Sunday mornings, or right here on YouTube from anywhere in the world!

Akili and Me is a new edutainment series from Ubongo Media, creators of Ubongo Kids. Kids 3-6 year olds will love joining Akili on her magical adventures in Lala Land, where they’ll learn numbers, letters, drawing and English.

Akili and Me is produced by Ubongo Media, creators of Ubongo Kids! We're a Tanzania based social enterprise that entertains kids to learn and love learning. Edutainment, made in Africa, for Africa!

children.title: Akili and Me - African Educational Cartoon!
children.description:
Ride the rainbow to Lala Land, and join Akili and her friends on a magical learning adventure. Sing with numbers, dance with letters, draw, play and learn English with Akili!

Watch “Akili and Me” on TBC1, 9am Saturday and Sunday mornings, and weekdays at 3pm!

Akili and Me is a new edutainment series from Ubongo Media, creators of Ubongo Kids. Kids 3-6 year olds will love joining Akili on her magical adventures in Lala Land, where they’ll learn numbers, letters, drawing and English.

children.title: Akili and Me - katuni mpya ya Ubongo Media
children.description:
Karibuni Lala Land, ulimwengu wa maajabu, ambapo utajifunza na kucheza na Akili!  Imba namba! Cheza herufi! Cheka, chora, na jifunza Kiingereza na Akili.

Angalia "Akili and Me" TBC1 saa 3 asubuhi j1 & j2 pamoja na Ubongo Kids.

Ride the rainbow to Lala Land, and join Akili and her friends on a magical learning adventure. Sing with numbers, dance with letters, draw, play and learn English with Akili!

Watch “Akili and Me” on TBC1, 9am Saturday and Sunday mornings!

Akili and Me ni mfululizo wa hadithi za kusisimua iliyo katika mfumo wa elimu-burudani kutoka UBONGO MEDIA ya Dar es Salaam.

Akili and Me is an African edutainment series from UBONGO MEDIA, creators of Ubongo Kids! It is produced in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.
